Topic

Coronavirus outbreak: All stories

An outbreak of a new strain of coronavirus was first reported in Wuhan, China. It has spread from mainland China through Hong Kong, Taiwan, Singapore, the Philippines, Thailand and Vietnam. Cases have also been reported in Europe, the United States, Canada and Australia. The World Health Organisation has declared a global public health emergency over the spread of the infection which has killed more than 1,000 people and sickened tens of thousands. It has named the disease Covid-19.

Coronavirus outbreak: All stories

An outbreak of a new strain of coronavirus was first reported in Wuhan, China. It has spread from mainland China through Hong Kong, Taiwan, Singapore, the Philippines, Thailand and Vietnam. Cases have also been reported in Europe, the United States, Canada and Australia. The World Health Organisation has declared a global public health emergency over the spread of the infection which has killed more than 1,000 people and sickened tens of thousands. It has named the disease Covid-19.
